TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerNearMe extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerNearMe Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerNearMe), ISerializable

summary.span: 表示通过“网络邻居”基础结构找到的对等方。

span.span: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接创建此类的实例。An instance of this class cannot be created directly. 相反，使用静态获取对"靠近"调用的对等方在对等节点的引用方法以返回附近的对等方的集合。Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static method to return a collection of nearby peers. 所表示的对等方对象不一定调用对等节点的通讯簿中。A peer represented by a object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索的数据存储在访问缓存和方法以及属性。The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the and methods as well as the property. 方法只需如果调用方未订阅将使用为指定， ，或。The method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified , , or . 此方法会阻止其他调用直至网络操作已完成且更新的缓存。This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated. 调用方不需要登录方法或通过用户界面在成功完成此操作。The caller is not required to sign in with the method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.

summary.span: 发出 事件信号。

span.span: Signals the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类继承的类可以重写此方法来执行其他任务时事件发生。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 此方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中，一定要调用基类的实现此方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: In a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索的数据存储在访问缓存和方法以及属性。The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the and methods as well as the property. 此方法只需如果调用方未订阅将使用为指定， ，或。This method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified , , or . 此方法会阻止其他调用网络操作已完成并更新缓存之前。This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated. 调用方不需要登录方法或通过用户界面在成功完成此操作。The caller is not required to sign in with the method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
